body: Hey guys! I have started youtube! Check my first video out and tell me your feedback! Link : http://youtu.be/D4F_v63F8iY
body_tagged: Hey guys! I have started youtube! Check my first video out and tell me your feedback! Link : http://youtu.be/D4F_v63F8iY
title: My first video! :D

replies.body:
I like this!

the only tying though is that you really shouldn't use Ezvid. This video was fine, but as your videos get longer, the quality get worse.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: Miguel nice video! But as franken said iypts OK to use ezvod right now but as you start getting more subs,views, and longer videos, you should use a different recorder...My personal favorite is Camtasia, good quality to, just keep downloading the free trial that's what I do,also when you record cut off your hot bar and maybe talk? please check out my channel  DerpyGaming , I just hit 100 subs and if you have any questions PLEASE ask! Especially if you want a cool intro, anyways, nice video and wish you luck on your YouTubez

replies.body: Yeah I know that Ezvid isn't the most reliable recording software but I have no clue how to edit videos myself so Ezvid is really useful to me! If I learn how to edit videos myself, I'll definitely get a different software. What do you mean by cut the hot bar? And I'm thinking on doing commentary only when I have someone else to help carry the commentary. And about the intro, I have no idea how to edit that in soooo yeah. To cut a long story short, IM A BIG NUB :) Hope you guys enjoy the videos though! (uploaded some more today)
